item.title: On Forecasting AIMSR 2025 - Part 1 / N
item.description: Introduction In this post, we will analyse India’s historic monsoon rainfall patterns. This analysis is the first step (i.e. 1 / N) to accurately and timely forecast All India Summer Monsoon Rainfall (AISMR) 2025 - and compare it with IMD’s official forecast released in May 2025. Data Collection We require India’s historic rainfall data. IMD Pune provides us with daily rainfall data over each \(0.25\degree * 0.25\degree\) grid over India for the time range \(1901 - 2024\).

item.title: Dalal Street and Beyond
item.description: Markets, business and policy are all driven by one thing - narrative. Welcome to The Narrative Podcast, the podcast where we break down the stories behind business, markets and policy. If you want to understand the world beyond the headlines, this is your space for insight, analysis and clarity. I am your host Kushal Juneja and in this episode - “Dalal Street and beyond” - we will discuss about the BSE, the NSE, the SENSEX and NIFTY indices, and also touch upon other major stock exchanges and indices around the world.
